19-031SC.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the minutes of the Sustainable CityCommission meeting of Thursday, October 24, 2019.Attachments: 10-24-19 Finished Agenda and Minutes.pdf10-24-19 Finished Agenda and Minutes.pdfA motion was made by Commissioner Gonzales, seconded by Commissioner Dillon, to approve recommendation. 19-032SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from Los Angeles County Public Works on the LA River Plan.Christine Wartman from the Los Angeles County Public Works, Stormwater Planning Division, lead the presentation on the Los Angeles River Plan.Mark Hanna, Ph.D., Leed AP from Geosyntec Consultants, project Manager followed up on the presentation.Chair Coffee spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainable City Coordinator, spoke.Commissioner Wheeler spoke.Mark Hanna, Ph.D., Leed AP from Geosyntec Consultants, project Manager spoke.A dialogue ensued between Mark Hanna, Ph.D., Leed AP from Geosyntec Consultants, project Manager and Commissioner Wheeler.Commissioner Rock spoke.Commissioner Gaytan spoke.Mark Hanna, Ph.D., Leed AP from Geosyntec Consultants, project Manager spoke.Commissioner Gonzales spoke.A dialogue ensued between Mark Hanna, Ph.D., Leed AP from Geosyntec Consultants, project Manager and Commissioner Gonzales.Chair Coffee spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Gonzales, seconded by Vice Chair Wheeler, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Eric Rock, Alan Tolkoff, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeePage 3 of 6CITY COUNCIL CHAMBERS411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDLONG BEACH, 4:00 PMWEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 4, 2019CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESAbsent: 4 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Nicholas Lind, Jenny Novak and Coby Skye3.

The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Eric Rock, Alan Tolkoff, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 4 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Nicholas Lind, Jenny Novak and Coby SkyePage 4 of 6CITY COUNCIL CHAMBERS411 W.
